Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry is a magical boarding school located in Scotland. It's where young witches and wizards receive their magical education and train to become skilled wizards.

Quidditch is a popular wizarding sport played on broomsticks. It involves four balls and seven players on each team, aiming to score points by throwing the Quaffle through hoops while also dodging Bludgers and catching the Golden Snitch.
The Half-Blood Prince is a mysterious character whose identity is revealed in the sixth Harry Potter book, "Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince." I won't spoil the surprise for you!

The Unforgivable Curses are three of the darkest and most powerful spells in the wizarding world: the Imperius Curse, the Cruciatus Curse, and the Killing Curse (Avada Kedavra). Their use is strictly prohibited and punishable by law.
